scripts.theme: CYPRESS_APIKEY=$apikey CYPRESS_VERSION=$version npx cypress run --browser chrome --no-exit --spec 'cypress/integration/theme_publish.js'
scripts.launch-stg: CYPRESS_APIKEY=$apikey CYPRESS_DISK_SIZE=$disk_size npx cypress run --browser chrome --no-exit --spec 'cypress/integration/stg-01-launch-apikey.js'
scripts.front-stg: CYPRESS_APIKEY=$apikey CYPRESS_BRANCH=$branch npx cypress run --browser chrome --no-exit --spec 'cypress/integration/stg-frontend-intersect.js'
